short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add unlimited bookmarks to the Chrome start page. Works with existing bookmarks folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wants to be more productive with your Chrome "Start page" / "New tab" links?

This extension allows you to add unlimited bookmarks and customize them so that every time you open a new tab you can instantly find your most commonly used links.

* Put the important bookmarks on the first page of Chrome.
* Use existing bookmarks folder.
* Customize the look of the bookmarks in your Chrome's "Start page".
* Search through all bookmarks.
